management instructions.actual: **Removal**: Manually remove the plants by pulling them out, ensuring you get the roots to prevent regrowth.
management instructions.expected: If not too numerous, you may wish to start with removing by hand.

management instructions.actual: **Barriers**: Consider installing barriers or fencing to keep dogs away from areas where white snakeroot is present.
management instructions.expected: If you choose to use herbicides, you will have to be careful to avoid harming other plants that are nearby.

management instructions.actual: maintain mulch to protect the roots.
